page.title: 16SAVE THE CHILDREN
page.content: {Round-About-Club}was an organised charity which had been run in school over 10 years. It's name was changed to {Young Save the Children Fund} (Y.S.C.F.)about 3 years ago.We save foil,stamps,wool and have held jumble sales,sponsored walks and spellings. The collected wool is crocheted into blankets and sent to{Y.S.C.F. } headquarters.The work done,money raised and blankets made over the years has helped children in{AFRICA. We are proud of our achievements and have gained certificates and trophies for such outstanding service to {SAVE {THE CHILDREN FUND.}Ayear ago {Princess {Anne}visited the Garrison and children from our group were presented to her in our tent Later they gave her a cheque for the funds we had raised.We have gained 5 Princess Anne Awards of since the start of {Y.S.C.F.}
